summary: The diff shows TungTungGame.tsx has been updated to load the character image from '/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png', render it on canvas with idle pulse animation, click flash/shake effects, and fallback placeholder. The combo/score mechanics are preserved. However, the actual image file (tung-character.dim_300x300.png) is not present in the diff as an added file, which is a key requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded image (IMG_0282.jpeg) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files. The image file frontend/public/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png does not appear in the added files list. The code references it but the asset itself is not present in the diff.
